headline: RTX Lands New Defense Deals As Earnings Power And Backlog Expand
summary: RTX (NYSE:RTX) has secured several large defense contracts, including a $1.7b Patriot air defense deal with Spain. The company also won a $248m U.S. Navy communications contract and a $197m reconnaissance system contract for Poland. These awards coincide with RTX working directly with government agencies on expanding defense production capacity. RTX, trading at $200.93, has seen its share price move strongly, with a 58.7% return over the past year and 211.6% over five years. The stock is...
